text.title: Text
text.description: The text content of the message.

type.title: Type
type.description: Indicates this content represents a tool call event.

id.title: Id
id.description: A unique identifier for this specific tool call instance.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the tool being called.

input.title: Input
input.description: The parameters being passed to the tool, structured as a dictionary of parameter names to values.

type.title: Type
type.description: Indicates this content represents a tool return event.

tool_call_id.title: Tool Call Id
tool_call_id.description: References the ID of the ToolCallContent that initiated this tool call.

content.title: Content
content.description: The content returned by the tool execution.

is_error.title: Is Error
is_error.description: Indicates whether the tool execution resulted in an error.

type.title: Type
type.description: Indicates this is a reasoning/intermediate step.

is_native.title: Is Native
is_native.description: Whether the reasoning content was generated by a reasoner model that processed this step.

reasoning.title: Reasoning
reasoning.description: The intermediate reasoning or thought process content.

signature.title: Signature
signature.description: A unique identifier for this reasoning step.

type.title: Type
type.description: Indicates this is a redacted thinking step.

data.title: Data
data.description: The redacted or filtered intermediate reasoning content.

type.title: Type
type.description: Indicates this is an omitted reasoning step.

tokens.title: Tokens
tokens.description: The reasoning token count for intermediate reasoning content.

otid.title: Otid
otid.description: The offline threading id associated with this message

messages.title: Messages
messages.description: The messages to be sent to the agent.

use_assistant_message.title: Use Assistant Message
use_assistant_message.description: Whether the server should parse specific tool call arguments (default `send_message`) as `AssistantMessage` objects.

assistant_message_tool_name.title: Assistant Message Tool Name
assistant_message_tool_name.description: The name of the designated message tool.

assistant_message_tool_kwarg.title: Assistant Message Tool Kwarg
assistant_message_tool_kwarg.description: The name of the message argument in the designated message tool.
